_comments.debug_mode: MASTER DEBUG SWITCH: If true, enables ALL verbose options (scraper + uploader + downloads + detailed HTML analysis)
_comments.verbose: DEPRECATED: Use debug_mode instead. Legacy option for backward compatibility
_comments.scraper_verbose: If true, shows detailed scraper info (BPM extraction, menu finding, file downloads)
_comments.uploader_verbose: If true, shows detailed uploader info (API calls, product creation, file uploads)
_comments.digital_downloads_verbose: If true, shows detailed digital download API info
_comments.beatstars_login.auto_login: If true, automatically login to BeatStars using saved credentials
_comments.beatstars_login.force_fresh_login: If true, ignore saved session and force fresh login every time
_comments.shopify_login.force_fresh_login: If true, ignore saved session and force fresh Shopify login
